## Checklist

- Priority
  - [ ] High
  - [ ] Medium
  - [ ] Low

- Size (rough estimate)
  - [ ] Small
  - [ ] Medium
  - [ ] Large

## Description

Describe the feature, including:

- Relevant user stories
- Designs, proof of concepts, examples
- Related issues    <!--- #11, #12 ... -->
- Link to Fabric Epic (Milestone)
